topic.title: How to Change the Font of MathML Equations

body.p: Consider that you need to change the font of the equations from the documentation, and also add some padding. The MathML fragments are wrapped in elements having the class equation-d/equation-block or equation-d/equation-inline, so we will match them:
body.note: Some of the fonts may not be supported. In that case, a default serif font is used.
